valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Sat 27 Dec 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Sun 28 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low Trafalgar 1003 slow-moving, filling 1007 by midday tomorrow. High Faeroes 1048 dissipating
